XXdhppat_u:319: granthās teṣāṃ na vidyante yeṣāṃ nāsti priyāpriyam ||
XXdhppat_u:322: kṣudhā parama rogāṇāṃ saṃskārā duḥkham eva tu |
XXdhppat_u:329: caje māttāsukhaṃ dhīro saṃpaśśaṃ vipulaṃ sukham ||
XXdhppat_u:331: tyajen mātrāsukhaṃ dhīraḥ saṃpaśyaṃ vipulaṃ sukham ||
XXdhppat_u:332: manujassa sadā satīmato māttaṃ jāniya laddhibhojane |
XXdhppat_u:333: tanukā 'ssa bhavanti vedanā śanikaṃ jīrati āyu pālayaṃ ||
XXdhppat_u:335: tanukāsya bhavanti vedanāḥ śanakair jīryati āyuḥ pālayam ||
XXdhppat_u:336: dullabho puruṣājaṃño na so sabbattha jāyati |
XXdhppat_u:337: yattha so jāyate vīro taṃ kulaṃ sukham edhati ||
XXdhppat_u:338: durlabhaḥ puruṣo jātyo nāsau sarvatra jāyati |
XXdhppat_u:339: yatrāsau jāyate vīras tat kulaṃ sukham edhate ||
XXdhppat_u:340: sabbattha ve sappuruṣā bhavanti na kāmakāmā lapayanti santo |
XXdhppat_u:341: sukhena puṭṭhā uttavā dukhena noccāvacaṃ sappuruṣā karonti ||
XXdhppat_u:342: sāpatrapāḥ satpuruṣā bhavanti na kāmahetor lapayanti santaḥ |
XXdhppat_u:343: spṛṣṭā hi dukhena tathā sukhena noccāvacāḥ satpuruṣā bhavanti ||
XXdhppat_u:344: jayaṃ veraṃ prasavati dukhaṃ śeti parājito |
XXdhppat_u:346: jayād vairaṃ prasavate duḥkhaṃ śete parājitaḥ |
XXdhppat_u:348: sukhā najjo sūpatitthā sukho dhammajito jano |
XXdhppat_u:350: sukhā nadī sūpatīrthā sukhaṃ dharmajino jinaḥ |
XXdhppat_u:352: sukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ śīlavanto sukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ bahuśśutā |
XXdhppat_u:353: arahanto pi sukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ vipramuttā niropadhī ||
XXdhppat_u:354: śīlavantaḥ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭuṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭuṃ bahuśrutāḥ |
XXdhppat_u:356: ye keci śokā paridevitaṃ vā dukkhaṃ va lokamhi anekarūpaṃ |
XXdhppat_u:357: priyaṃ paṭicca prabhavati ete priye asante na bhavanti ete ||
XXdhppat_u:358: śokā hi vai paridevitaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca lokasya hi naikarūpam |
XXdhppat_u:359: priyaṃ pratītyeha tad asti sarvaṃ priye 'sati syān na kathaṃ cid etat ||
XXdhppat_u:360: tassā hi te sukhino vītaśokā yesaṃ priyaṃ nāsti like |
XXdhppat_u:361: tassā aśokaṃ virajaṃ prātthayānā priyaṃ na kayirātha kahiṃci loke ||
XXdhppat_u:362: tasmād dhi te sukhitā vītaśokā yeṣāṃ priyaṃ nāsti kathaṃ cid eva |
XXdhppat_u:363: tasmād aśokaṃ padam eṣamāṇaḥ priyaṃ na kurvīta hi jīvaloke ||
XXdhppat_u:369: ākāśe va śakuntānāṃ padaṃ tesāṃ durannayaṃ ||
XXdhppat_u:372: śānto tassa mano hoti śāntā vācā ca kaṃmu ca |
XXdhppat_u:374: śāntam asya mano bhavati śāntā vāk kāyakarma ca |
XXdhppat_u:376: yassendriyāṇi samataṃ gatāni aśśā yathā sārathinā sudāntā |
XXdhppat_u:377: prahīṇamānassa anāsavassa devā pi tassa prihayanti tāyino ||
XXdhppat_u:378: yasyendriyāṇi samatāṃ gatāni aśvo yathā sārathinā sudāntaḥ |
XXdhppat_u:379: prahīṇadoṣāya nirāsravāya devāpi tasmai spṛhayanti nityam ||
XXdhppat_u:382: dānto vai samitiṃ yāti dāntaṃ rājādhirohati |
XXdhppat_u:384: varam assatarā dāntā ājāneyā va sendhavā |
XXdhppat_u:385: kuñjarā va mahānāgā āttā dānto tato varaṃ ||
XXdhppat_u:386: yo hy aśvaṃ damayej jānyam ājāneyaṃ ca saindhavam |
XXdhppat_u:387: kuñjaraṃ vā mahānāgam ātmā dāntas tato varam ||
XXdhppat_u:388: na hi tehi jānajātehi tāṃ bhūmim abhisaṃbhave |
XXdhppat_u:390: na hi tena sa yānena tāṃ bhūmim abhisaṃbhavet |
XXdhppat_u:391: yām ātmanā sudāntena dānto dāntena gacchati ||
XXdhppat_u:392: śelo yathā ekaghano vātena na samīrati |
XXdhppat_u:394: śailo yathāpy ekaghano vāyunā na prakampyate |
XXdhppat_u:398: apeto damasaccena na so kāṣāyam arihati ||
XXdhppat_u:402: upeto damasaccena sa ve kāṣāyam arihati ||
XXdhppat_u:403: yas tu vāntakaṣāyaḥ syāc chīleṣu susamāhitaḥ |
XXdhppat_u:408: dhaṃdhaṃ hi karato puṃñaṃ pāpamhi ramate mano ||
XXdhppat_u:410: dhandhaṃ hi kurvataḥ puṇyaṃ pāpeṣu ramate manaḥ ||
XXdhppat_u:411: kayira ce puruṣo pāpaṃ na naṃ kayirā punappuno |
XXdhppat_u:412: na tamhi chanda[ṃ] kayirātha dukkho pāpassa sa[ṃ]cayo ||
XXdhppat_u:413: karyāc cet puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ nainaṃ kuryāt punaḥ punaḥ |
XXdhppat_u:414: na tatra cchandaṃ kurvīta duḥkhaṃ pāpasya saṃcayaḥ ||
XXdhppat_u:415: kayira ce puruṣo pu[ṃ]ña[ṃ] kay[i]ra cena[ṃ] punappuno |
XXdhppat_u:416: tamh[i] eva chanda[ṃ] kayirātha sukho puṃñassa saṃcayo ||
XXdhppat_u:417: kuryāt tu puruṣaḥ puṇyaṃ kuryāc cainaṃ punaḥ punaḥ |
XXdhppat_u:418: tatra cchandaṃ ca kurvīta sukhaṃ puṇyasya saṃcayaḥ ||
XXdhppat_u:421: śuddhasya hi sadā phalguḥ śuddasya poṣathaḥ sadā |
XXdhppat_u:423: akataṃ dukkataṃ śreyo pacchā tapati dukkataṃ |
XXdhppat_u:424: dukkataṃ me kataṃ ti śocati bhūyo śocati doggatiṃ gato ||
XXdhppat_u:425: akṛtaṃ kukṛtāc chreyaḥ paścāt tapati duṣkṛtaṃ |
XXdhppat_u:426: śocate duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtvā śocate durgatiṃ gataḥ ||
XXdhppat_u:427: katañ ca sukataṃ sādhu yaṃ kattā nānutappati |
XXdhppat_u:428: sukataṃ me kataṃ ti nandati bhūyo nandati soggatiṅ gato ||
XXdhppat_u:429: kṛtaṃ tu sukṛtaṃ śreyo yat kṛtvā nānutapyate |
XXdhppat_u:430: nandate sukṛtaṃ kṛtvā nandate sogatiṃ gataḥ ||
XXdhppat_u:431: pāpo pi paśśate bhadraṃ yāva pāpaṃ na paccati |
XXdhppat_u:432: yadā tu paccate pāpaṃ atha pāpo pāpāni paśśati ||
XXdhppat_u:433: pāpo 'pi paśyate bhadraṃ yāvat pāpaṃ na pacyate |
XXdhppat_u:434: yadā tu pacyate pāpam atha pāpāni paśyati ||
XXdhppat_u:435: bhadro pi paśśate pāpaṃ yāva bhadraṃ na paccati |
XXdhppat_u:436: yadā tu paccate bhadraṃ atha bhadro bhadrāṇi paśśati ||
XXdhppat_u:437: bhadro 'pi paśyate pāpaṃ yāvad bhadraṃ na pacyate |
XXdhppat_u:438: yadā tu pacyate bhadram atha bhadrāṇi paśyati ||
XXdhppat_u:439: pāpaṃ pi karato bhadraṃ yāva pāpaṃ na paccati |
XXdhppat_u:440: atha payirāgate kāle pāpo pāpāni paśśati ||
XXdhppat_u:441: bhadraṃ pi karato pāpaṃ yāva bhadraṃ na paccati |
XXdhppat_u:442: atha payirāgate kāle bhadro bhadrāṇi paśśati ||
XXdhppat_u:443: pāṇimhi ce vraṇo nā 'ssa dhāreyā pāṇinā viṣaṃ |
XXdhppat_u:444: nāvraṇe viṣam anneti nāsti pāpam akurvvato ||
XXdhppat_u:445: pāṇau cāsya vraṇo na syād dhārayet pāṇinā viṣam |
XXdhppat_u:446: nāvraṇe krāmati viṣam nāsti pāpam akurvataḥ ||
XXdhppat_u:447: na hi pāpakaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ sajjaṃ chīram va mucchati |
XXdhppat_u:448: dahantaṃ bālam anneti bhassachanno va pāpako ||
XXdhppat_u:449: na hi pāpakṛtaṃ karma sadyaḥ kṣīram iva mūrchati |
XXdhppat_u:451: na hi pāpakaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ sajjaṃ śastam va kantati |
XXdhppat_u:452: maraṇo 'peto hi jānāti yā gatī pāpakaṃmuno ||
XXdhppat_u:453: na hi pāpakṛtaṃ karma sadyaṃ śastram iva kṛntati |
XXdhppat_u:454: sāmparāye tu jānāti yā gatiḥ pāpakarmaṇām ||
XXdhppat_u:455: anāgataṃ paṭikayirātha kiccaṃ mā vo kiccaṃ kiccakāle vyadheyā |
XXdhppat_u:456: taṃ tārisaṃ paṭikatakiccakāriṃ na naṃ kiccaṃ kiccakāle vyadhehi ||
XXdhppat_u:457: pūrvaṃ hi kṛtyaṃ pratijāgareta mā me kṛtyaṃ kṛtyakāle vihanyāt |
XXdhppat_u:458: taṃ nityakāle pratiyatyakāriṇaṃ naiva kṛtyaṃ kṛtyakāle vihanti ||
XXdhppat_u:459: paṭikacceva taṃ kayirā yaṃ ñāyyā hitam āttano |
XXdhppat_u:460: na śākaṭikamanti ssa mantaṃ dhīro parākrame ||
XXdhppat_u:461: pratiyatyeva tat kuryād yaj jānrd dhitam ātmanaḥ |
XXdhppat_u:463: yathā śākaṭiko māggaṃ samaṃ hettā mahāpathaṃ |
XXdhppat_u:464: viṣamaṃ māggam āsājja akkhachinno tha jhāyati ||
XXdhppat_u:465: yathā śākaṭiko mārgaṃ samaṃ hitvā mahāpatham |
XXdhppat_u:466: viṣamaṃ mārgam āgamya cchinnākṣaḥ śocate bhṛśam ||
XXdhppat_u:468: bālo maccumukhaṃ prātto akkhachinno va jhāyati ||
XXdhppat_u:469: evaṃ dharmād apakramya hy adharmam anuvartya ca |
XXdhppat_u:470: bālo mṛtyuvaśaṃ prātac chinnākṣa iva śocate ||
XXdhppat_u:472: pāpā pāpehi kaṃmehi nirayaṃ te upapajjatha ||
XXdhppat_u:474: pāpā hi karmabhiḥ pāpair ito gacchanti durgatim ||
XXdhppat_u:475: abhūtavādī nirayaṃ upeti yo cāpi kattā na karomī ti āha |
XXdhppat_u:476: ubho pi te precca samā bhavanti nihīnakaṃmā manujā paratra ||
XXdhppat_u:477: abhūtavādī narakān upaiti yaś cānyad apy ācaratīha karma |
XXdhppat_u:478: ubhau hi tau pretya samau niruktau nihīnadharmau manujau paratra ||
XXdhppat_u:479: yo apraduṣṭassa naro praduṣyati śuddhassa poṣassa anaṃganassa |
XXdhppat_u:480: tam eva bālaṃ pracceti pāpaṃ sukhumo rajo paṭivātaṃ va khito ||
XXdhppat_u:481: yo hy apraduṣṭasya narasya duṣyate śuddhasya nityaṃ vigatāṅgaṇasya |
XXdhppat_u:482: tam eva bālaṃ pratyāti pāpaṃ kṣiptaṃ rajaḥ prativātaṃ yathaiva ||
XXdhppat_u:483: vāṇijo va bhayaṃ va māggaṃ appasāttho mahaddhano |
XXdhppat_u:485: vaṇig vā sabhayaṃ mārgaṃ alpaśāstro mahādhano |
XXdhppat_u:491: kuṇapassa pi gaṃdhucchijjati u 'ddhukitassa (-chitassa) pi rāti accayā |
XXdhppat_u:492: puruṣassa adhammacāriṇo annāhaṃ gandho na chijjati ||
XXdhppat_u:493: yatha ggrahapatayo prabhūtaratanā āḍitte nagaramhi dahyamāne |
XXdhppat_u:495: tatha-r-iva śamaṇā prabhūtapraṃñā ayirā ayirapathesu sicchamānā |
XXdhppat_u:496: jātijarāmaraṇabhayāddittā dukkhāṭṭā vyāyamanti api prāpuṇema śāntiṃ ||
XXdhppat_u:499: na puṣpagandho paṭivātam eti na candanaṃ tagaraṃ vāhlikaṃ vā |
XXdhppat_u:500: satān tu gandho paṭivātam eti sabbā diśā sappuruṣo pravāti ||
XXdhppat_u:501: na puṣpagandhaḥ prativātam eti na vāhnijāt tagarāc candanād vā |
XXdhppat_u:502: satāṃ tu gandhaḥ prativātam eti sarvā diśaḥ satpuruṣaḥ pravāti ||
XXdhppat_u:503: candanaṃ tagaraṃ cāpi uppalaṃ atha vāśśikiṃ |
XXdhppat_u:508: yo tu śīlavatāṃ gandho vāti devesu uttamo ||
XXdhppat_u:509: alpamātro hy ayaṃ gaṃdho yo 'yaṃ tagaracandanāt |
XXdhppat_u:510: yas tu śīlavatāṃ gandho vāti deveṣv apīha saḥ ||
XXdhppat_u:515: yathā pi ruciraṃ puṣpaṃ vannavantaṃ agandhakaṃ |
XXdhppat_u:516: evaṃ subhāṣitā vācā aphalā hoti akurvvato ||
XXdhppat_u:517: yathāpi ruciraṃ puṣpaṃ varṇavat syād agandhavat |
XXdhppat_u:518: evaṃ subhāṣitā vācā niṣphalā sāv akurvataḥ ||
XXdhppat_u:519: yathā pi ruciraṃ puṣpaṃ vannavantaṃ sagaṃdhakaṃ |
XXdhppat_u:520: evaṃ subhāṣitā vācā saphalā hoti kurvvato ||
XXdhppat_u:521: yathāpi ruciraṃ puṣpaṃ varṇavat syāt sugaṃdhavat |
XXdhppat_u:522: evaṃ subhāṣitā vācā saphalā bhavati kurvataḥ ||
XXdhppat_u:523: yathā pi bhramaro puṣpā vannagandham aheḍayaṃ |
XXdhppat_u:524: praḍeti rasam ādāya evaṃ ggrāme munī care ||
XXdhppat_u:526: paraiti rasam ādāya tathā grāmaṃ muniś caret ||
XXdhppat_u:528: suttaṃ ggrāmaṃ mahogho vā maccu-r-ādāya gacchati ||
XXdhppat_u:530: suptam grāmaṃ mahaughaiva mṛtyur ādāya gacchati ||
XXdhppat_u:534: atṛptam eva kāmeṣu tv antakaḥ kurute vaśam ||
XXdhppat_u:535: yathā pi puṣparāśimhā kayirā mālāguṇe bahū |
XXdhppat_u:536: evaṃ jātena māccena kātavvaṃ kuśalaṃ bahuṃ |
XXdhppat_u:538: evaṃ jātena martyena kartavyaṃ kuśalaṃ bahu |
XXdhppat_u:539: ko imaṃ paṭhaviṃ vijehiti yamalokaṃ va imaṃ sadevakaṃ |
XXdhppat_u:540: ko dhammapade sudeśite kuśalo puṣpam iva prajehiti ||
XXdhppat_u:541: ko imāṃ pṛthivīṃ vijeṣyte yamalokaṃ ca tathā sadevakam |
XXdhppat_u:542: ko dharmapadaṃ sudeśitaṃ kuśalaḥ puṣpam iva praceṣyate ||
XXdhppat_u:543: śer̥̄kho paṭhaviṃ vijehiti yamalokaṃ va imaṃ sadevakaṃ |
XXdhppat_u:544: so dhammapade sudeśite kuśalo puṣpam iva prajehiti ||
XXdhppat_u:545: śaikṣaḥ pṛthivīṃ vijeṣyate yamalokaṃ va tathā sadevakam |
XXdhppat_u:546: sa hi dharmapadaṃ sudeśitaṃ kuśalo puṣpam iva prajehiti ||
XXdhppat_u:548: evaṃ rāgañ ca doṣañ ca vipramuñcatha bhikkhavo ||
XXdhppat_u:549: varṣāsu hi yathā puṣpaṃ vaguro vipramuñcati |
XXdhppat_u:550: evaṃ rāgaṃ ca doṣaṃ ca vipramuñcata bhikṣavaḥ ||
XXdhppat_u:551: phenopamaṃ lokam imaṃ vidittā marīcidhammaṃ abhisaṃbudhānāṃ |
XXdhppat_u:552: chettāna mārassa prapuṣpakāni addaṃśanaṃ maccurājassa gacche ||
XXdhppat_u:553: phenopamaṃ kāyam imaṃ viditvā marīcidharmaṃ paribudhya caiva |
XXdhppat_u:554: chitveha mārasya tu puṣpakāni tv adarśanaṃ mṛtyurājasya gacchet ||
XXdhppat_u:558: padmaṃ tatra tu jāyeta śucigandhi manoramam ||
XXdhppat_u:565: manujassa pramattacāriṇo tahnā vaddhati mālutā iva |
XXdhppat_u:566: sā prāplavate hurāhuraṃ phalameṣī va vanamhi vānnaro ||
XXdhppat_u:567: manujasya pramattacāriṇas tṛṣṇā vardhati māluteva hi |
XXdhppat_u:568: sa hi saṃsarate punaḥ punaḥ phalam icchann iva vānaro vane ||
XXdhppat_u:569: yaṃ cesā sahate jaṃmī tahnā loke duraccayā |
XXdhppat_u:570: śokā tassa pravaddhaṃti ovaṭṭhā beruṇā iva ||
XXdhppat_u:571: ya etāṃ sahate grāmyāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ loke sudustyajām |
XXdhppat_u:572: śokās tasya pravardhante hy avavṛṣṭā bīraṇā yathā ||
XXdhppat_u:573: yo cetāṃ sahate jaṃmiṃ tahnāṃ loke duraccayāṃ |
XXdhppat_u:574: śokā tassa vivaṭṭanti udabindū va pukkhare ||
XXdhppat_u:575: yas tv etāṃ tyajate grāmyāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ loke sudustyajām |
XXdhppat_u:576: śokās tasya nivartante udabindur iva puṣkarāt ||
XXdhppat_u:577: taṃ vo vademi bhadraṃ vo yāvaṃt-ittha samāgatā |
XXdhppat_u:578: tahnāṃ samūlāṃ khaṇatha uṣīrātthī va beruṇiṃ |
XXdhppat_u:579: tahnāya khatamūlāya nāsti ṣokā kato bhayaṃ ||
XXdhppat_u:580: tad vai vadāmi bhadraṃ vo yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ |
XXdhppat_u:582: tṛṣṇāyāḥ khātamūlāya nāsti ṣokaḥ kuto bhayam ||
XXdhppat_u:587: etam ādīnavaṃ nyāttā tahnā dukkhassa saṃbhavaṃ |
XXdhppat_u:589: etad ādīnavaṃ jñātvā tṛṣṇā duḥkhasya saṃbhavaṃ |
XXdhppat_u:590: vītatṛṣṇo hy anādānaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet ||
XXdhppat_u:591: na taṃ dṛḍhaṃ bandhanam āhu dhīrā yad āyasaṃ dārujaṃ babbajaṃ vā |
XXdhppat_u:592: sārttarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu putresu dāresu ca yā apekhā ||
XXdhppat_u:593: na tad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanam āhur āryā yad āyasaṃ dāravaṃ balbajaṃ vā |
XXdhppat_u:594: saṃraktacittasya hi mandabuddheḥ putreṣu dāreṣu ca yā apekṣā ||
XXdhppat_u:595: etaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bandhanam āhu dhīrā ohārinaṃ sukhumaṃ dupramuñcaṃ |
XXdhppat_u:596: etappi chettāna vrajanti santo anapekhino sabbadukhaṃ prahāya ||
XXdhppat_u:597: etad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanam āhur āryāḥ samantataḥ susthiraṃ duṣpramokṣam |
XXdhppat_u:598: etad api cchitvā tu parivrajanti hy anapekṣinaḥ kāmasukhaṃ prahāya ||
XXdhppat_u:600: na karṣāpaṇavarṣeṇa tṛptiḥ kāmair hi vidyate |
XXdhppat_u:601: api divvesu kāmesu ratiṃ so nādhigacchati ||
XXdhppat_u:603: api divyeṣu kāmeṣu sa ratiṃ nādhigacchati ||
XXdhppat_u:607: sa ve antimaśārīro mahapraṃño ti vuccati ||
XXdhppat_u:608: saritāni sinehitāni ca somanassāni bhavanti jantuno |
XXdhppat_u:609: ye sātasitā sukheṣiṇo te ve jātijaropagā ||
XXdhppat_u:610: saritāni vai snehitāni vai saumanasyāni bhavanti jantunaḥ |
